patterns: How can I book a flight?
What are the best hotels in [city]?
Where can I rent a car?
responses: You can book a flight by visiting our website or contacting our customer service.
Here are some highly recommended hotels in [city]: [hotel1], [hotel2], [hotel3].
You can rent a car from various car rental agencies located in [city].

patterns: How can I schedule a doctor's appointment?
What should I do in case of a medical emergency?
Does my insurance cover this procedure?
responses: You can schedule a doctor's appointment by calling our hospital's scheduling department.
In case of a medical emergency, please call 911 or visit the nearest emergency room.
To determine if your insurance covers a specific procedure, please contact your insurance provider.
